name: Unreal II: The Awakening
summary: Unreal II: The Awakening is a first-person shooter video game developed by Legend Entertainment and published by Infogrames on February 3, 2003. Originally released for Microsoft Windows, the game was later ported to Microsoft's Xbox console by Tantalus. It is the sequel to the 1998 video game Unreal and part of the franchise of the same name.
